data.name: TIME FOR YOU - THE OFFICIAL WALKTHROUGH
data.detailed_description:
The Official Walkthrough for Time For You!

If you're looking to find and do everything in the game and get the TRUE ENDING, this is for you.

This walkthrough is a work-in-progress and will continue to be updated as each chapter of Time For You is released.

Note: The walkthrough assumes that you are trying to get the TRUE ENDING, as well as the HAREM ENDING. If you do not wish to get those endings, follow the walkthrough and simply refuse the characters you do not wish to be with.

How to get the Walkthrough in-game?
The walkthrough will have its own app icon on your in-game phone's home page once it is installed (located above the "Messages" icon). Simply click it to load the pdf walkthrough.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A PDF reading software is required.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A PDF reading software is required.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A PDF reading software is required.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only. There is explicit sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious and all characters are 18 and over.

Contains nudity, mature language, vaginal and non-penetrative sexual acts.
